alert.note: Alert for Mobile (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Advisory issued August 10 at 9:14AM CDT until August 10 at 12:15PM CDT by NWS Mobile
info.description: The National Weather Service in Mobile has issued a * Flood Advisory for... Central Mobile County in southwestern Alabama... * Until 1215 PM CDT. * At 914 AM CDT, Doppler radar indicated heavy rain due to showers and isolated thunderstorms. Minor flooding is ongoing or expected to begin shortly in the advisory area. Between 1 and 1.5 inches of rain have fallen. * Some locations that will experience flooding include... Midtown Mobile, Downtown Mobile, Prichard, Chickasaw, I10 And I65, I65 And I165, Tacon, Mertz, Neshota, Navco, Plateau, Whistler and North Mobile. Additional rainfall amounts of 1 to 1.5 inches are expected over the area. This additional rain will result in minor flooding.
info.instruction: Be aware of your surroundings and do not drive on flooded roads.
